comment: Full of flavor, leaves a pleasant aroma on the pallet, Glenfiddich has to be the best brand of single malt
Nice balance with a good hit of peat balanced by some sweetness
Plenty of peat that lingers on the pallet. Woody as well
Let peat i næse, god krydret smag
God smag af karamel og nød. En anelse røg.
Dejlig smag og en anelse røg
